backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor file serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four completed features: black/white UI color scheme, C++ code formatting improvements, copyable code functionality, and reduced descriptive text around experiments.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and key functionality in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with monochromatic OKLCH color system defining grayscale design tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with page title 'Bittu Kadai' and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, conditionally rendering PasswordGate or authenticated Layout with AnswerList and DeveloperProfile.
frontend/src/components/AnswerCard.tsx: Card component displaying code experiments with monospace formatting, copy-to-clipboard functionality, and share buttons using black/white styling.
frontend/src/components/AnswerList.tsx: Container component rendering two C++ code experiment cards with minimal titles and properly formatted code content.
frontend/src/components/DeveloperProfile: Profile card displaying developer JoshNvrDie's information with avatar, description, and Instagram link in grayscale styling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper with 'Bittu Kadai' header, black/white gradient background, and decorative grayscale blur effects.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: Authentication component validating password 'wommala' with 3-attempt limit, 5-minute lockout, countdown timer, and black/white styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating and refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing identity state and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordAttempts.t: Custom hook managing password attempt tracking with a 3-attempt limit and 5-minute lockout period, persisting state to localStorage with countdown timer.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for React Query backend interaction hooks; currently all functionality is client-side only.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom black-and-white monochromatic color palette using OKLCH color space, supporting both light and dark modes with grayscale tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH-based color system, container settings, border radius variables, and typography/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing 'Bittu Kadai' - a password-protected C++ programming experiments showcase with 3-attempt login, developer profile for JoshNvrDie, and responsive design requirements.
